quoteText: SONIC and its affiliated entities do not accept unsolicited ideas. Therefore, if you send any text, ideas, drawings, slogans, pictures, audio, video, or other information to SONIC through the SONIC Online Services, by e-mail or otherwise, your submission will become the property of SONIC, and SONIC will have no duty to preserve or return your submission. By sending your submission, you agree that your submission is not confidential nor proprietary and that SONIC may use and own your submission for any purpose whatsoever now and in the future without any obligation to obtain your permission or to compensate you.
title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
